message:
Oh no!
Below 5%—don't give up! Review the basics and try again.

Keep pushing!
Below 20%, there's room to grow. Focus and retry!

You're getting there!
Below 35%, keep practicing and learning.

Good effort!
Below 53%, you're more than halfway—stay consistent!

Nice work!
Below 65%, you're improving—keep going strong!

Great job!
Below 85%, you've mastered most of it—almost perfect!

Congratulations!
95% and above—exceptional work, you nailed it!
